oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic fields of MTT Agrifood Research Finland Karila
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
Soil
Crop husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The fields of Karila experimental station have been under organic farming partly since 1995 (4 hectares) and partly since 2001 (5,5 hectares). Nowadays they are under crop rotation of organic dairy farm consisting of 2 year old clover based leys, pulse crops and vetch based green fodder. Soil type is fine sand. The annual rainfall is about 650 mm, average temperature 3.1째C (growing season 12.6째C), growing season about 160 days and effective temperature sum 1200째C.
